languages.text: "Культистский амулет — это что такое? Та бирюлька, что у мертвого пропойцы нашли? Если это что-то злое или запрещенное, так мы не знали же... Блюстители нам трепали — мол, ищем еретиков среди вас, наказания за несодействие расследованию. Только откуда здесь еретики? Мы своих всех в лицо знаем, нового не было никого".

"A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."
languages.original_text: "Культистский амулет — это что такое? Та бирюлька, что у мертвого пропойцы нашли? Если это что-то злое или запрещенное, так мы не знали же... Блюстители нам трепали — мол, ищем еретиков среди вас, наказания за несодействие расследованию. Только откуда здесь еретики? Мы своих всех в лицо знаем, нового не было никого".

traits.locale_text: "A Chaos amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The guards just said they were looking for pirates among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be pirates here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

The guards just said they were looking for pirates among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be pirates here? The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: “邪教的护身符？那是什么东西？是那个死了的酒鬼身上的便宜货吗？如果它真的是什么邪恶的东西，或者被禁止的东西，我们也都不知情……那些执法者只是说他们在找窝藏在我们之中的异端分子，所有胆敢妨碍他们调查的人都会受到惩罚。可我们之中怎么会窝藏异端分子呢？这些人都是我们自己人，我们都认识，而且也没有新面孔混进来。”
languages.original_text: "A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."

traits.locale_text: “邪教的护身符？那是什么东西？是那个死了的酒鬼身上的便宜货吗？如果它真的是什么邪恶的东西，或者被禁止的东西，我们也都不知情……那些镇压者只是说他们在找窝藏在我们之中的海盗，所有胆敢妨碍他们调查的人都会受到惩罚。可我们之中怎么会窝藏海盗呢？这些人都是我们自己人，我们都认识，而且也没有新面孔混进来。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: «¿Un amuleto cultista? ¿Eso qué es? ¿La cosa que encontraron en el borracho muerto? Si era malvado o estaba prohibido, nosotros no teníamos ni idea... Los guardias solo dijeron que estaban buscando herejes escondidos, y que todo el que obstruyera su investigación sería castigado. Pero ¿cómo va a haber herejes aquí? Conocemos a los nuestros y no ha llegado ninguna cara nueva».
languages.original_text: "A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."

traits.locale_text: «¿Un amuleto sectario? ¿Eso qué es? ¿La cosa que encontraron en el borracho muerto? Si era malvado o estaba prohibido, nosotros no teníamos ni idea... Los guardias solo dijeron que estaban buscando piratas escondidos, y que todo el que obstruyera su investigación sería castigado. Pero ¿cómo va a haber piratas aquí? Conocemos a los nuestros y no ha llegado ninguna cara nueva».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: 「教団のお守り？それは何だ？酔っぱらいの死体から見つかったお守り？もしそれが邪悪なものであったり、禁じられたものであったとしても、俺たちにはわからんね…エンフォーサーはただ、俺たちの中に異端者がいないか探していて、捜査を妨害する者は処罰すると言っただけだ。でも、どうしてここに異端者がいるんだ？俺たちは仲間のことは知っているし、新顔もこの辺りにゃいないんだ」
languages.original_text: "A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."

traits.locale_text: 「教団のお守り？それは何だ？酔っぱらいの死体から見つかったお守り？もしそれが邪悪なものであったり、禁じられたものであったとしても、俺たちにはわからんね…エンフォーサーはただ、俺たちの中に異端者がいないか探していて、捜査を妨害する者は処罰すると言っただけだ。でも、どうしてここに異端者がいるんだ？俺たちは仲間のことは知っているし、新顔もこの辺りにゃいないんだ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Ein Kultistenamulett? Was soll das sein? Das Kinkerlitzchen, das sie bei dem toten Säufer gefunden haben? Wenn das etwas Böses oder Verbotenes war, wussten wir das gewiss nicht ... Die Enforcers haben nur gesagt, dass sie nach Ketzern suchen, und dass jeder bestraft wird, der ihre Untersuchung behindert. Aber wie sollte es hier Ketzer geben? Wir kennen unsere Leute, und neue Gesichter gibt es nicht."
languages.original_text: "A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Kultistenamulett? Was soll das sein? Das Kinkerlitzchen, das sie bei dem toten Säufer gefunden haben? Wenn das etwas Böses oder Verbotenes war, wussten wir das gewiss nicht ... Die Enforcers haben nur gesagt, dass sie nach Piraten suchen, und dass jeder bestraft wird, der ihre Untersuchung behindert. Aber wie sollte es hier Piraten geben? Wir kennen unsere Leute, und neue Gesichter gibt es nicht."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: « Une amulette de cultiste ? Voilà autre chose... Vous parlez de la cochonnerie qu'on a retrouvée sur le cadavre de l'autre ivrogne ? Si c'est un objet maléfique ou interdit, je vous assure qu'on en savait rien... Les prévôts ont juste dit qu'ils cherchaient des hérétiques infiltrés dans nos rangs et que quiconque ferait obstruction à leur enquête serait puni. Sauf qu'il y a pas d'hérétiques ici. Depuis le temps qu'on vit tous ensemble, on se connaît bien et on a pas vu de nouvelle tête dernièrement. »
languages.original_text: "A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."

traits.locale_text: « Une amulette de cultiste ? Voilà autre chose... Vous parlez de la cochonnerie qu'on a retrouvée sur le cadavre de l'autre ivrogne ? Si c'est un objet maléfique ou interdit, je vous assure qu'on en savait rien... Les prévôts ont juste dit qu'ils cherchaient des pirates infiltrés dans nos rangs et que quiconque ferait obstruction à leur enquête serait puni. Sauf qu'il y a pas de pirates, ici. Depuis le temps qu'on vit tous ensemble, on se connaît bien et on a pas vu de nouvelle tête dernièrement. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong

languages.text: "Tarikatçı uğurluğu mu? O da nesi? Ölü sarhoşun üstünde buldukları zımbırtı mı? Habis yahut yasak bir şeyse bilmediğimiz kesin... İnfazcıların dediğine göre aramızda bir kâfir varmış, onu arıyorlarmış. Bulunmasına engel olan herkes cezalandırılacakmış. Ama burada kâfirin işi ne? Herkes birbirini tanıyor, yeni gelen de olmadı."
languages.original_text: "A cultist amulet? What's that? The gewgaw they found on the dead drunkard? If it was something evil or forbidden, we sure didn't know... The enforcers just said they were looking for heretics among us, and anyone obstructing their investigation would be punished. But how could there be heretics here? We know our own people, there have been no new faces around."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikatçı uğurluğu mu? O da nesi? Ölü sarhoşun üstünde buldukları zımbırtı mı? Habis yahut yasak bir şeyse bilmediğimiz kesin... İnfazcıların dediğine göre aramızda bir kâfir varmış, onu arıyorlarmış. Bulunmasına engel olan herkes cezalandırılacakmış. Ama burada kâfirin işi ne? Herkes birbirini tanıyor, yeni gelen de olmadı."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderStrong
